title: He pleaded for F-16s for Ukraine but died in a crash before he could fly one
description: The midair collision that killed three Ukrainian pilots adds to the military’s woes as it struggles to advance a counteroffensive against Russia.

title: Greece struggles to contain Europe’s largest wildfire on record
description: Ongoing fires have scorched 310 square miles.

title: Wagner chief Prigozhin is buried in secret as Kremlin seeks to avoid unrest
description: Putin did not attend as private funerals began Tuesday for Prigozhin and other mercenary leaders killed in a suspicious plane crash last week. Some supporters had called for military honors.

title: Pope criticizes ‘reactionary’ conservative elements in U.S. Catholic Church
description: “When you abandon doctrine in life to replace it with an ideology, you have lost,” the pope told a meeting in Portugal this month.

title: France to ban full-length Muslim dresses in schools, renewing fierce debate
description: The French government said the full-length robes worn by some Muslim women have “no place in our schools, no more than religious symbols,” which are banned under secularism laws.

title: Spain’s soccer chief could be ousted after kiss sparks boycott. Here’s what to know.
description: The head of Spain’s soccer federation, Luis Rubiales, kissed player Jenni Hermoso on the lips after Spain’s victory in the women’s World Cup. She says it wasn’t consensual.

title: Germany drops sexual assault investigation of Rammstein lead singer
description: Prosecutors said there was no evidence of sexual assault and the women quoted in a number of press accounts had not reported to the public prosecutor.

title: From cosmetics to clothes: Chinese consumers punish Japan over Fukushima
description: Chinese citizens, spurred on by Beijing’s angry denunciation of Japan’s decision to release treated water from the Fukushima nuclear site, are urging boycotts.

title: What Arctic ice tells us about climate change
description: I went with scientists to study a remote part of the Greenland ice sheet. Here’s what I learned, and why it matters for the rest of the world.

title: Uproar over Libya-Israel meeting shows challenges for normalization
description: The revelation that the foreign ministers of Libya and Israel met secretly in Rome has sparked protests in Libya and sent the Libyan minister fleeing the country.

title: Congressional trip to Syria, rare and brief, highlights a forsaken region
description: The visit was intended as a show of solidarity with Syrians in areas outside government control, but it also underscored the limited U.S. role in the region.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Poland, Baltics call on Belarus to expel Wagner; footage of Paul Whelan released
description: Poland — along with Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia — threatened to close border crossings with Belarus should a “critical incident” occur, citing security concerns.
